title: Research & Publications
text: My research focus lies at the intersection of Agricultural Statistics, Spatial Machine Learning, and Agrometeorology. I am particularly interested in how statistical modeling and computational tools can optimize decision-making in the Amazon and other complex agricultural landscapes.

title: Werlleson Nascimento
text:
I am a PhD candidate in Statistics and Agricultural Experimentation at ESALQ/USP and a Visiting Scholar at the University of Illinois Urbana-Champaign (UIUC), specifically in the Department of Agricultural and Biological Engineering (ABE).
My research integrates Machine Learning, Spatial Statistics, and Applied Statistics to address complex challenges in agricultural research. Currently, I am focused on Spatial Machine Learning and Topoclimatic Zoning, seeking to transform data into actionable insights for the agricultural sector.
